robot.navigation

Class TwoWheeledRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.navigation.TwoWheeledRobot

  • public class TwoWheeledRobot
extends java.lang.Object
    The two wheeled robot class. Deals with movement of the wheels and measuring their displacement.
    Since:
    2013-11-03
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Andreas
